EmailTemplate.name: 202004_EMEAI_C&PS_APUS-Reliability-Tech-Updates_Webinar_On24.1.Invitation - APUs
EmailTemplate.subject: Webinars: APU and Avionics -Roadmap and Technical Updates
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Customer,
We are pleased to announce a series of webinars covering our latest product roadmaps, reliability updates and technological changes we have implemented based on your feedback.
You are cordially invited, along with your colleagues, to join us for these workshop-style sessions to give you deep functional insights, covering platform-wide, fleet level and product specific reliability updates,Â in-service hacks, market trends and more.
We will be hosting the first two webinars of the series on April 29, 2020 and April 30, 2020 covering:
Auxiliary Power Unit Reliability and Technical Updates on April 29, 2020
- 131-9A - HGT1700 - 331-350 REGISTER NOW <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/learn/about-us/events/2020/04/auxiliary-power-unit-reliability-and-technical-updates]]> Avionics - Roadmap and Updates on April 30, 2020
- IntuVue RDR-4000 Weather Radar System - HF Transceiver XK156D1 - Enhanced Ground Proximity Warning System (EGPWS) - 737 DEU BP15 and DU Blanking Update - 737 NG Exterior Lights REGISTER NOW <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/learn/about-us/events/2020/04/avionics-roadmap-updates]]> We look forward to meeting you online for these informative webinars. Stay tuned for more webinars to be announced shortly.
Honeywell Aerospace Events Team
